question: Will Kamala Harris say "Context" during DNC speech?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris says "context" during her DNC keynote speech. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Kamala Harris does not give a keynote speech at the DNC this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "context" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the background information that gives meaning to a situation.

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

question: Trump mentioned >100 times at the DNC today?
description:
This market refers to anything said in person on the main stage of the United Center on the second night of the DNC. Programming is currently scheduled to begin at 5:30 PM CT and end at 10:15 PM CT (see: https://demconvention.com/schedule/). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if "Trump" is said 101 or more times on the second night of the DNC.  Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any live mention on stage which is audible on the stream of the event will count toward this market. Ads won't count - only in-person mentions count. Pluralization/possessive of "Trump" will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count. Note for example if "Donald is running for President" is said, it doesn't count as a mention - only "Trump" counts.

Compound words will count as long as "Trump" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the person Donald Trump.

The resolution source will be the video of the second night of the DNC.

question: Kamala or Trump convention speech gets more viewers?
description:
25.38 million people tuned in to the last night of the 2024 Republican National Convention (RNC) on July 18 according to Nielsen. You can read more about that here: https://www.nielsen.com/news-center/2024/over-25-million-viewers-tune-in-for-final-night-of-2024-republican-national-convention/ 

This market will resolve to "Kamala" if the final night of the 2024 Democratic National Convention (DNC) has more viewers than the final night of the RNC. This market will resolve to "Trump" if the final night of the 2024 RNC has more viewers than the final night of the DNC.

The resolution source will be information from Nielsen, specifically their Persons 2+ statistic. If Nielsen does not provide viewership information for the DNC by September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source may be chosen.

question: Will Harris publicly support tax on unrealized gains?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris announces that she publicly supports a tax on unrealized gains by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

This market will only resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris explicitly states her support of having a tax on unrealized gains. If the proposed tax is only for certain individuals (i.e. high net worth individuals), this market will still resolve to "Yes."

If Harris broadly states she agrees with Biden's policy proposals, and one of Biden's policy proposals is to tax unrealized gains, it will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" - she must explicitly support the specific proposal.

This market will only resolve based on official announcements by Kamala Harris and/or her representatives. These announcements must occur after this market's creation date (August 20).

description:

If the game is canceled or delayed beyond August 31, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the English Premier League.

If Buttigieg does not give a speech at the DNC this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "mayor" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the elected head of a city, town, or other municipality.

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

question: Trump nominates Tulsi Gabbard to Cabinet?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump wins the 2024 election and nominates Tulsi Gabbard for a Cabinet position by January 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will immediately resolve to "No" if Donald Trump loses the 2024 US Presidential Election.

A Cabinet position is defined as any of the heads of the 15 executive departments or a role formally designated as Cabinet-level by the President. Advisory roles will not qualify for this market. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Montana's abortion protection measure pass?
description:
The Montana CI-128, Right to Abortion Initiative (2024), is set to be voted on during the November 5, 2024 US general elections. More information on this initiative can be found here: https://ballotpedia.org/Montana_CI-128,_Right_to_Abortion_Initiative_(2024)

This market will resolve "Yes" if the Montana CI-128, Right to Abortion Initiative passes as a result of the vote scheduled for November 5, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible media sources regarding this vote, however in case of ambiguity this market may remain open until official state results are released.

events.title: Which states will pass amendments protecting abortion?
events.description: This is a market group on whether the following states' amendments on abortion, scheduled to be voted on in the upcoming November 2024 election, will pass.

question: Speed/Kai beat hardcore Minecraft by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if IShowSpeed or Kai Cenat beat Minecraft hardcore by Friday, August 23, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is only necessary that only IShowSpeed or Kai Cenat win; both do not need to win.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official video from IShowSpeed (https://www.youtube.com/@IShowSpeed) and Kai Cenat (https://www.youtube.com/@KaiCenatLive), however a consensus of credible sources will also be used.

question: Will Speed/Kai have <50 deaths by end of Minecraft challenge?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Speed/Kai have less than 50 Minecraft deaths by the end of their hardcore Minecraft challenge. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No."

This market will resolve once they complete the challenge, or abandon the challenge altogether/stop counting Minecraft deaths.

If the counter reaches over that amount, this market may immediately resolve to "No."

The resolution source is the Death counter on https://www.twitch.tv/kaicenat.

events.title: # of Speed/Kai Minecraft deaths by end of challenge?
events.description: This is a market on predicting the number of Minecraft deaths Speed/Kai by the end of their challenge.

The resolution source is the Death counter on https://www.twitch.tv/kaicenat.

question: Will Speed/Kai give up on challenge before Saturday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if IShowSpeed and Kai Cenat both give up on their ongoing attempt to beat Minecraft hardcore by Friday, August 23, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is necessary for IShowSpeed and Kai Cenat to both give up on this challenge. Both must fully give up on their attempt; a break will not count. However, if they give up and start the stream over later (e.g. the timer restarts and deaths start at 0 again), it will count as giving up.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official video from IShowSpeed (https://www.youtube.com/@IShowSpeed) and Kai Cenat (https://www.youtube.com/@KaiCenatLive), however a consensus of credible sources will also be used.

question: Speed/Kai beat Minecraft on 41st attempt?
description:
IShowSpeed and Kai Cenat are presently at 40 deaths in their hardcore Minecraft challenge.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if IShowSpeed and Kai Cenat beat their hardcore Minecraft challenge during the present attempt, without dying. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If either IShowSpeed or Kai Cenat die during the present attempt, this market will resolve immediately to "No". If either streamer permanently gives up on the challenge in the middle of this attempt, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official video from IShowSpeed (https://www.youtube.com/@IShowSpeed) and Kai Cenat (https://www.youtube.com/@KaiCenatLive), however a consensus of credible sources will also be used.
